description: The WILDCROSS is made for running in all the wild places you like to go. This season, the upper is even more comfy and flexible with sporty lines, bright colors and plenty of get-up-and-go. This shoe likes to go far and fast, whether you’re on a local trail or whizzing through the wilderness. Try a pair and embrace your wilder self.
name: Salomon Wildcross 2 - Mens
